post.body: Uhh...can I have '05 back and while we are at it '99, '00, and '01, as well. Happy New Year AJV. Looking fwd to connecting w/u in '09!
You said it! In a bad economy, people go to whom they trust for advice, etc... build a relationship, and they will come!!
I say @stevengrande but I am biased :) Happy New Year!
Happiest of New Years to you and your family, too. Hope to see you in '09 after all this snow melts.
1st...it's never too early to start drinking. 2nd, if it was anything like the Absinthe of old, I would be right there with you.
Are you guys getting snowball snow or powdery snow. Just North of Boston we are getting powdery stuff.
I got the Kodak Zi6HD for Christmas. It is super easy to use and is less than the Flip - http://tinyurl.com/7qvha5
www.MyTweetSpace.com - I think??
"Booty Call" refers to a non-relationship based "fling". Any emotion between the two other than temporary passion is not allowed.
I also got a chance to try on the Corum Admirals Cup. Now, I am not a sailor nor a fan of the sport; but I love that watch!!
I wish! With Christmas and other bills, I can't even afford to pay attention right now!!
This is the one...http://tinyurl.com/8zbm7u
Go to Mohegan Sun Casino and make it $20k...LOL! No, really, I would pay off some old debt. Start '09 FRESH!!
I just stopped into my local AD. I met a Jacquet Droz that I think I might leave my wife for.
Im sure everyone will bring a bottle of something. We are having so few over that even if they did, we wouldn't have enough.
Oh, I had a great Balbo Soprani Moscato for Christmas Day. Then opened a Barbaresco for the big roast dinner.
Great, I will drop him off later today. Can I pick him up in about....5-6 yrs??
Hi Everyone!! Happy New Year!! Just got back from New Years brunch w/ the family. Anyone looking to buy a 4 yr. old?? LOL!!
Off to greet my guests for the start of my NYE party. It was a pleasure meeting you all in '08. I can't wait to see you in '09! Peace n Luv!
I am going to read some more interpretations of Marcus Aurelius, now! Good night to all my friends, new and old!
